text: Læw phu dı lea khux phu thi xthrrm ying kwa phu thi xup hol k khwam thec hı kæ xallxh hrux ptiseth brrda xongkar khxng phraxngkh chn hela ni hæla swn khxng phwk khea thi thuk kahnd wi nan k ca dikæ phwk khea cnkwa br rdathut khxng rea thi ca xeachiwit khxng phwk khea di mayang phwk khea doy klaw wa hin lea sing thi phwk than wingwxn khx xun ca kxallxh? Phwk khea k klaw wa khea hela nan di hayhna pi cak rea seiy læw læa phwk khea di yunyan kætaw phwk khea xeng wa phwk khea nan pen phu ptiseth kar sraththa
